meanings.sent3: During the training exercise, the cadet tried to reconnoiter the wrong location by mistake.
meanings.sent4: The detective had to reconnoiter the crime scene to gather evidence.
meanings.sent5: The explorer decided to reconnoiter the uncharted territory for hidden treasures.
